context: Hi. Great. Do you like Westerns?
I just saw The Magnificent Seven (2016) and it was awesome.
I also enjoyed Desperado (1995) I enjoyed that as well!
Did you see the original 3:10 to Yuma (1957)
I havent! does it hold up?
It's better than the original. But I like the old-timey actors like Glenn Ford I mean it's better than the remake
Well that's not too hard hah
resp: And Jeff Bridges in True Grit (2010)
